Producer: Joel Viertel, Brad Feinstein, George Nolfi, Nnamdi Asomugha, Jonathan Baker, David Lewis Smith, Anthony Mackie
Screenwriter: Niceole Levy, George Nolfi, David Lewis Smith, Stan Younger, Brad Kane
Rating: PG-13 (Some Strong Language|A Sexual Reference|Smoking Throughout|Racial Epithets)
Synopsis: In the 1960s, two entrepreneurs hatch an ingenious business plan to fight for housing integration and equal access to the American Dream.
Title: The Banker
